<template>
  <Navbar :logo="logo_src" :alt="alt_name" />
  <router-view />
  <Footer />
</template>

<script>
import Footer from "./components/Footer.vue";
import Navbar from "./components/Navbar.vue";
import Logo from "/img/logo.png";
export default {
  components: {
    Navbar,
    Footer,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      logo_src: Logo,
      alt_name: "Home",
    };
  },
};
</script>
